plot: Training film depicting the fundamentals of electricity and how electrical signals can be used to keep an airplane on correct course and altitude through an autopilot.
title: Basic Electricity, As Applied to Electronic Control Systems
plot_es: Training film depicting the fundamentals of electricity and how electrical signals can be used to keep an airplane on correct course and altitude through an autopilot.
original_name: Basic Electricity, As Applied to Electronic Control Systems
plot_en: Training film depicting the fundamentals of electricity and how electrical signals can be used to keep an airplane on correct course and altitude through an autopilot.
